pages.title: Kuuga's Tomb
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Kuuga (2000, TV show)$(br2)Spawn locations: River, Frozen River$(br2)Includes suspicious gravel$(br2)Suspicious gravel drops:$(li)1 $(l:kuuga/items/kuuga_growing)Kuuga Growing Amadam$(/l) (28.6%)$(li)1 $(l:kuuga/items/amadam_stones#kuuga_mighty)Kuuga Mighty Amadam$(/l) (28.6%)$(li)1 $(l:kuuga/items/amadam_stones#kuuga_dragon)Kuuga Dragon Amadam$(/l) (14.3%)
